srb.title: Prva grupa naših Nepeta je prebačena iz kontrolisanih in vitro uslova u staklaru na aklimatizaciju
NEPETOME na Danu fascinacije biljkama 2022
srb.text:
Šta je čarobno u svetu Nepeta: miris ili izgled cvetova?


Na Danu fascinacije biljkama, 18. maja 2022. godine, saradnici Instituta za biološka istraživanja “Siniša Stanković” organizovaće radionicu za decu predškolskog i mlađeg školskog uzrasta pod nazivom “Šta je čarobno u svetu Nepeta: miris ili izgled cvetova?”. Deca će imati priliku da vide desetak različitih vrsta roda Nepeta, gajenih u staklenoj bašti, kao i u laboratorijskim uslovima. Osetiće njihove jedinstvene mirise. Saznaće otkud potiču mirisi i kako se oni mogu upotrebiti prilikom izrade sapuna. Takođe će imati priliku da vide nakit izrađen od Nepeta. Deca će iskazati svoju kreativnost bojenjem crteža cvetova Nepeta.


Kontakt osobe: dr Jasmina Nestorović Živković, dr Tijana Banjanac, dr Slavica Dmitrović


slavica.dmitrovic@ibiss.bg.ac.rs

srb.title: Najava radionice projekta NEPETOME
srb.text:
U okviru projekta “Omics-guided disentangling of the iridoid diversity in the genus Nepeta L. for in planta metabolic engineering towards sustainable exploitation” (NEPETOME), finansiranog od strane Fonda za nauku Republike Srbije, bice odžana radionica “Metodologija proucavanja raznovrsnosti iridoidnih jedinjenja kod predstavnika roda Nepeta”.


Radionica će biti održana 06. oktobra 2022. godine u Botaničkoj bašti “Jevremovac” u Beogradu.


Učestvuju: dr Uroš Gašić, dr Jasmina Nestorović Živković, dr Slavica Dmitrović, dr Dragana Matekalo, dr Branislav Šiler, dr Tijana Banjanac, dr Jelena Božunović, dr Neda Aničić i Luka Petrović sa Instituta za biološka istrażivanja “Siniša Stanković” - Institut od nacionalnog značaja za Republiku Srbiju, Univerziteta u Beogradu.


Predavanje u okviru radionice imaju za cilj da učesnike upoznaju sa biologijom različitih vrsta roda Nepeta kao i mogućnostima upotrebe najsavremenijih metoda metaboličkog inženjeringa u cilju intenziviranja proizvodnje iridioida u in planta biosintetiskim platformama.


Program predavanja biće naknadno objavljen.

srb.title: Izveštaj sa terena
srb.text: Tokom juna i jula 2022. godine naši istraživači su obišli sledeće lokacije: Goč, Suboticu, Ramski pesak, Majdanpek, Rtanj, Staru planinu, Vlasinsko jezero i Besnu kobilu. Ukupno je sakupljeno 12 populacija vrste Nepeta nuda i 4 populacija vrste Nepeta cataria. Do sledećeg leta, javljamo se iz laboratorije!

en.title: The first bunch of Nepeta plants are transferred from in vitro to greenhouse conditions
NEPETOME at Fascination of Plants Day 2022
en.text:
What is so magical in the world of Nepeta: scent or looks of flowers?


At the Fascination of Plants Day, on May 18th 2022, associates of the Institute for Biological Research “Siniša Stanković” will organize a workshop for children of preschool and younger school age entitled ”What is so magical in the world of Nepeta: scent or looks of flowers?”. Children will have the opportunity to see a dozen different species of the genus Nepeta, grown in a greenhouse, as well as in laboratory conditions. They will smell their unique scents. They will find out where scents come from and how they can be used to make soap. They will also have the opportunity to see jewelry made of Nepeta. Children will express their creativity by coloring drawings of Nepeta flowers.


Contact persons: dr Jasmina Nestorović Živković, dr Tijana Banjanac, dr Slavica Dmitrović


slavica.dmitrovic@ibiss.bg.ac.rs

en.title: Project NEPETOME workshop announcement
en.text:
Project “Omics-guided disentangling of the iridoid diversity in the genus Nepeta L. for in planta metabolic engineering towards sustainable exploitation” (NEPETOME), supported by the Science Fund of the Republic of Serbia, #Grant No 7749433, organize a one-day workshop on “Methodology of iridoids diversity investigation within the genus Nepeta” that will take place on 6th October 2022 at Botanical garden “Jevremovac” in Belgrade. The workshop is organized for postgraduate and PhD students whose work focuses on plant physiology and molecular biology.


The lectures within the workshop aim to introduce the participants to the biology of different Nepeta species, as well as the possibilities of using the most modern methods of metabolic engineering, thus making the initial steps towards the large-scale production of Nepeta iridoids in plant factories. The participants will have the opportunity to interlink diverse theoretical concepts with cutting-edge methodology for their validation.


Selected speakers are Dr. Uroš Gašić, Dr. Jasmina Nestorović Živković, Dr. Slavica Dmitrović, Dr. Dragana Matekalo, Dr. Branislav Šiler, Dr. Tijana Banjanac, Dr. Jelena Božunović, Dr. Neda Aničić and PhD student Luka Petrović from the Institute for Biological Research “Siniša Stanković” - National Institute of the Republic of Serbia, University of Belgrade.


NEPETOME Workshop 2022 is envisioned to help students in their professional development, as well as their networking opportunities. Students are expected to take an active role in discussions on various topics.


For more details regarding the workshop program, selected teachers, eligibility, application process and deadline please review the descriptions on our website.

en.title: Field report
en.text: During June and July 2022, our researchers have visited the following locations: Subotica, Ramski Pesak, Majdanpek, Vlasina Lake and mountains Rtanj, Stara Planina, Goč and Besna Kobila. A total of 12 populations of the species Nepeta nuda and 4 populations of the species Nepeta cataria were collected. Until next summer and new field trips, follow our news from the wet lab!
